message.name: INF_PROCESS_PAYMENT_RESPONSE_SUB
message.locale: Report from Process Payment Response batch job run on %1s at %2s.

message.name: ERR_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, payments for up to %2n Payment Instruments will not have been processed.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENTS_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Payment Instruments processed: %1n

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENTS_SKIPPED
message.locale: Total number of Payment Instruments skipped: %1n

message.name: INF_PROCESS_CANCELLED_PAYMENTS_SUB
message.locale: Report from Process Cancelled Payments batch job run on %1s at %2s.
